## AbstractDevice.readPixelsToBuffer() method

Read pixel values from current frame buffer to a GPU buffer

**Signature:**

```typescript
readPixelsToBuffer(index: number, x: number, y: number, w: number, h: number, buffer: GPUDataBuffer): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  index | number | color attachment index |
|  x | number | x position of the reading area |
|  y | number | y position of the reading area |
|  w | number | width of the reading area |
|  h | number | height of the reading area |
|  buffer | [GPUDataBuffer](doc/markdown/./device.gpudatabuffer.md) | The output buffer |

**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

This method does not support WebGL1 device
